description:
Veruca James has a million-dollar body. Not only is it hotter than any other wife’s on the block, it also COSTS her husband a million.

As Veruca’s financial slave, DJ is required to write her out a check for anything her beautiful heart desires. $2000 to rub her feet, $5000 to worship her ass. Another couple grand to sleep at her feet. The list goes on!

Watch as this beautiful wife spanks his ass, torments his balls, punches the piss outta him, fuck his pathetic asshole, and rides his face to orgasm– charging every step of the way.
title: Sexy Wife Financially Dominates Her Rich Loser Husband
